sen.j: 海部壮平（1847年 - 1895年）は元尾張藩藩士。
sen.e: Sohei KAIFU (1847 - 1895) was an ex-feudal retainer of Owari Domain.
Sohei KAIFU (1847 - 1895) was an ex-feudal retainer of Owari Domain.
Sohei KAIFU (1847 - 1895) was an ex-feudal retainer of Owari Domain.

sen.j: 弟海部正秀とともに名古屋コーチンを作出したことで知られる。
sen.e: He was know for newly producing Nagoya cochin along with his younger brother Masahide KAIFU.
He was known for newly producing Nagoya cochin (Japanese native breed chicken) together with his younger brother Masahide KAIFU.
sen.cmt: 名古屋コーチンの説明を追加し、along withをtogether withに変更しました。
sen.e: He was known for newly producing Nagoya cochin (Japanese native breed chicken) together with his younger brother Masahide KAIFU.

sen.j: 祖先の海部定右ヱ門正親は海部流砲術始祖。
sen.e: His ancestor Jouemonmasachika KAIFU was a founder of Kaifu style artillery.
His ancestor Joemonmasachika KAIFU was a founder of Kaifu style artillery.
His ancestor Joemonmasachika KAIFU was a founder of Kaifu style artillery.

sen.j: また第76・77代内閣総理大臣の海部俊樹は遠縁にあたる（壮平の姉の曾孫）。
sen.e: Also he was a distant relative to the 76th and 77th prime minister of Japan Toshiki KAIFU (a great grandchild of Sohei's sister).
Also he was a distant relative of the 76th and 77th prime minister of Japan Toshiki KAIFU (a great grandchild of Sohei's sister).
Also he was a distant relative of the 76th and 77th prime minister of Japan Toshiki KAIFU (a great grandchild of Sohei's sister).
